overview: In The Future, A Computer bug sets a new breed of armed and dangerous villains loose on an unsuspecting world. Digital game characters who govern their own destiny and with global domination at their cyber fingerprints pose the biggest threat to mankind. Our greatest hope lies with the "Techno Warriors" to capture and drag them back into the digital domain.
tagline: In the future computer characters control themselves, it's the job of the Techno Warriors to stop them from taking over our world.
title: Techno Warriors
